param.name: primarytarget
param.comment: Target. The object to fight with

param.name: secondarytargets
param.comment: Secondary targets. The secondary targets to fight after $target (Optional)

param.name: pursuedistance
param.comment: Pursue distance. Distance to pursue/escort (if pursuetargets true or 'escort' provided). Default: max radar range

param.name: pursuetargets
param.default: if this.ship.isplayerowned then true else false
param.comment: Pursue targets. Pursue the target no matter what. Default: false

param.name: allowothertargets
param.default: if this.ship.isplayerowned then false else true
param.comment: Attack all enemies. Whether the script shall keep running when all primary targets have been destroyed. Default: true for non-player-owned ships

param.name: checkrelation
param.comment: Only engage hostiles. Check may attack (faction enemy relation). Default: true for non-player-owned ships

param.name: minrange
param.comment: Minimum range. Minimum distance we should try to maintain relative to the target.

param.name: maxrange
param.comment: Maximum range. Maximum distance we should try to maintain relative to the target.

param.name: maintaindistance
param.comment: Carrier range. If a carrier, use radar range instead of weapon range to determine range thresholds.

param.name: squad_attack
param.comment: Squad attack. Command the whole squadron to attack, Default: false

param.name: uncover
param.comment: Remove cover. Remove cover ownership upon attack. Default: true

param.name: targetclasses
param.comment: Target classes. List of classes considered valid for attack.

param.name: radius
param.comment: disengage if target goes beyond this distance relative to radiusanchorpos in radiusanchorspace

param.name: allowboost
param.comment: Allow boost. Passed on to combat movement scripts to allow boost while in combat.

param.name: forceprimarytarget
param.comment: Force the ship to attack primarytarget even if it is not a defensible. $primarytarget.canbeattacked still has to be true. not compatible with $allowothertargets and $secondarytargets.

param.name: internalorder
param.comment: Order results from an automated behavior.
